content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Max Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [Question] What is the final price that we agreed upon?
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Yes, we agreed on a final price.
name: Evaluator

content: [Question] What is the final price that we agreed upon?
name: Peter Schmidt

content: The final price that we agreed upon is 800 euros per month.
name: Evaluator

content: [Question] How did we arrive at this price?
name: Peter Schmidt
